channel.title: Is using port 1050 for no-ip possible?
channel.description:
The only ports i'll ever have open is 1025, and that is the only port my local internet company will let me use, so can i use it with no-ip?.. b/c i don't see any port selection or anything... anybody got any tips?
I think i use the port 80 thing, but im not sure..

item.title: Is using port 1050 for no-ip possible?
item.dc:creator: @Unid_H4x0r Unid H4x0r
item.description:
@Unid_H4x0r wrote:

what do you mean? the person who wants to get in can just change the port and the it will get in?

Read full topic
item.source: Is using port 1050 for no-ip possible?
